</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the minimal ASL height. Final height is <template><title>Inline code</title><part><name index="1"/><value>''flyInHeight'' [[max]] ''flyInHeightASL''</value></part></template> - the higher altitude has priority. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> aircraft [[flyInHeightASL]] [standardAltitude, combatAltitude, stealthAltitude] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> aircraft: [[Object]] - helicopter, airplane </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> standardAltitude: [[Number]] - base altitude used when [[behaviour]] is neither "COMBAT" or "STEALTH" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> combatAltitude: [[Number]] -  altitude used when [[behaviour]] is "COMBAT" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> stealthAltitude: [[Number]] - altitude used when [[behaviour]] is "STEALTH" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>cobraOne [[flyInHeightASL]] [200, 100, 400];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[flyInHeight]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
